home.title: YouTube MP4 to MP3 Video Downloader
home.description: Paste your YouTube video link below and click 'Download'. Download and convert YouTube videos to MP3 for free online.
home.maximum: Paste the links below, maximum three links at a time.
home.downloadError: Unable to download MP3 or Video.

hero.title: Free Online YouTube Video Downloader
hero.paragraph: Tired of struggling to download and convert your favorite YouTube videos into different formats? Want a fast, reliable, and user-friendly solution to enjoy your content offline? Look no further! The YouTube Video Downloader (Converter) is here to revolutionize your download and conversion experience.

items.title: Supports multiple formats
items.context: YT5S supports a wide range of video and audio formats, converting YouTube videos to MP4, 3GP, WebM, MP3, OGG, and M4A.

items.title: High-quality video downloads
items.context: Our platform allows downloading YouTube videos in resolutions like 720p, 1080p, 2K, and even 4K.

items.title: User-friendly interface
items.context: YT5S is designed to be easy to use, allowing you to download and convert videos in just a few clicks.

items.title: No software installation required
items.context: YT5S is an online tool that doesn’t require any installation — simply paste the link and start downloading.

items.title: Fast download speed
items.context: We’ve optimized our platform for the fastest possible download speeds.

items.title: Cross-platform compatibility
items.context: YT5S works on Windows, Mac OS X, iOS, and Android.

signin.title: Sign in to Tube
signin.description: Welcome back, please sign in to continue.

signup.title: Create your account
signup.description: Welcome, please fill in the details to get started.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.description: Fill the detail, next we will send you an email to ensure that it is you.

steps.context: Enter your desired YouTube link or keywords into the search box, then click Convert.
Choose your preferred output format (MP4 or MP3) and click 'Download'.
Wait a few moments for the conversion to finish and download your file.

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.description: Your payment has been processed successfully. Your premium features are now active.
success.supportNote: Need help? Contact our support team.

cancel.title: Payment Cancelled
cancel.description: Your payment was cancelled and no charges were made.
cancel.message: You can try again anytime or choose a different payment method.
cancel.supportNote: Need help? Contact our support team.
